overview: Will Rico be found? In his previous outing, Rico performed sex acts with gusto and then disappeared from his house mates, not that anyone particularly asked for him, as the other guys in his manse were a bit too busy with each other to notice anything was missing if it couldn't be found in a lube bottle or condom wrapper. The question remains not "where is Rico," but will anyone put down anyone else long enough to look for him?
title: Where is Rico? 2
